text: Two posters are accepted by AMIA Annual Symposium 2023! And congratulations to [Taylor Hawkins]() and [Kurt Miller]() for the acceptance of their student papers! Congratulations to [Andrew Wen](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=ipa09SEAAAAJ) for the acceptance of the JAMIA and npj Digital Medicine!

Relocated to New Haven, CT for my new role as a Research Scientist in the [Department of Biomedical Informatics and Data Science](https://medicine.yale.edu/biomedical-informatics-data-science/) at [Yale University School of Medicine](https://medicine.yale.edu/)!
Congratulations to [Dr. Moon](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Hn1uXhMAAAAJ&hl=en) for the acceptance of two JMIR papers!
AMIA IS 2023 @Seattle! Sleepless in Seattle (due to deadlines and two oral presentations :)! Nice city, people, and food!

Congratulations to [Dr. Liu](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=2TXcctIAAAAJ&hl=en) for the [Established Investigator Award](https://www.cprit.state.tx.us/news-events/articles/cprit-approves-90-million-to-boost-cancer-research-prevention-efforts-across-texas/)!
Happy new year! Updated the data structure and layout of my website with [Pelican](https://getpelican.com/)!

Congratulations to [Dr. Riaz](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=ETwPvLQAAAAJ) and [Syed Arsalan Ahmed Naqvi](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=oUUrNngAAAAJ&hl=en) for the paper acceptance of JAMA Oncology! And, my podium, system demo, and poster are accepted by AMIA IS 2023!

Enjoy AMIA 2022 and serve as paper co-chair for VAHC 2022 @Washington D.C.! And congratulations to [Dr. Moon](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Hn1uXhMAAAAJ&hl=en) for her Distinguished Paper Award in AMIA 2022! And my poster and co-author paper are accepted by IEEE BIBM 2022!
Meet friends in IEEE VIS 2022 @Oklahoma City!
Our team 'COVID-19 Predictive Analytics Task Force' received Mayo Clinic Team Science Award.
Two posters are accepted in IEEE VIS 2022!
Our papers, podiums, and posters are accepted in AMIA 2022! And serve as the Web Chair for [IEEE ICHI 2022](https://ohnlp.github.io/IEEEICHI2022/).
AMIA IS 2022 @Chicago!

Congratulations to [Dr. Riaz](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=ETwPvLQAAAAJ) and [Syed Arsalan Ahmed Naqvi](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=oUUrNngAAAAJ&hl=en) for the [ASCO Merit Award](https://twitter.com/IrbazRiaz/status/1494400585713389569)!
Submissions are accepted by AMIA IS 2022 and Bioinformatics!
Nice trip to San Diego for AMIA 2021! So many people!
IEEE VIS 2021 Virtual ... Hope to be hybrid or offline next year in Oklahoma!
Two posters are accepted in IEEE VIS 2021!
One oral presentation and two posters are accepted in AMIA 2021!
Still work from home ... submitted our works to VIS and AMIA! Keep coding!
Virtual AMIA 2020! So many events, wow...
Virtual VIS20 is also great! Got **Best Poster Award** of IEEE VIS 2020! Happy!
Two posters are accepted by IEEE VIS 2020! Congratulations to Yating on the acceptance of her FIRST TVCG track paper!
Two posters are accepted by AMIA 2020!
Start work from home ... work hard!
Meet people at VIS19 in Vancouver! 3 papers are accepted in IEEE BigData 2019! Congratulations to Rongzhe and Yingchao!
Mayo Clinic Orientation!
PhD defense passed! A paper is accepted in VAST'19!
PhD Dissertation submitted!
An IJCAI demo has been accepted!
My first SCI paper has been accepted!
**Two** demos are accepted in WWW'19 demonstration track!
The paper of VUC is accepted in CompEd'19!
VIS18 is exciting! Impressive trip to Berlin.
VUSphere has been accepted in VAST 2018 Conference Track! So happy!
My **FIRST** first author international conference paper has been accepted by Edutainment'18! So excited!
